title: Games Freezes Randomly
body: I am having a great time playing league then suddenly it will freeze. I am on windows 10 and do not have a clue why this would happen. Any advise? RIOT?

replies.body: What kind of freezing are you seeing? Does the game completely freeze up and you have to force close to make anything happen, or are you seeing little stutters here and there? If it's completely freezing up during a match, it could be a sign of some corrupted files in your installation. Hit me back up with a little more information and we'll be able to troubleshoot a little more accurately!

Thank you for responding. 

The game complete freezes but I still have the sound of everything going on. I can move my courser and talk to the people on curse. I cannot exit the game and when I try to exit the game, the screen goes black. 

I have tried doing a full repair, reinstall, and even factory resetting my computer. 

my computer hardware:
Processor AMD FX(tm)-8320 Eight-Core Processor
 
Video Card AMD Radeon HD 7800 Series
 
Video Card #2 AMD Radeon HD 7800 Series
 
RAM 16 GB
 
Operating System Microsoft Windows 10 (build 15063), 64-bit

Issue solved! There was an update for my graphics cards. (AMD graphics). Make you your drivers are up to date. AMD made a giant update recently and it affected LOL as well. RIOT why could you of not  of just said that?
